quotes.text: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment, first to let go of life, finally to take a step without feet.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: You have to keep breaking your heart until it opens.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Through love all that is bitter will be sweet.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: I am not this hair. I am not this skin. I am the soul that lives within.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: What you seek is seeking you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: You were born with wings. Why prefer to crawl through life?
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: It's your road and yours alone, others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: As you start to walk on the way, the way appears.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Start a huge, foolish project, like Noah. It makes absolutely no difference what people think of you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The garden of the world has no limits, except in your mind.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Travel brings power and love back into your life.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: These pains you feel are messengers. Listen to them.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: What hurts you, blesses you. Darkness is your candle.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Very little grows on jagged rock. Be ground, be crumbled, so wild flowers will come up where you are.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The cure for pain is in the pain.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Don't you know yet? It is your light that lights the world's.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: There is a candle in your heart, ready to be kindled. There is a void in your soul, ready to be filled. You feel it, don't you?
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: If light is in your heart, you will find your way home.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Why should I stay at the bottom of a well when a strong rope is in my hand?
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Inside you there's an artist you don't know about.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Set your life on fire, seek those who fan your flames.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Live life as if everything is rigged in your favor.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Forget safety. Live where you fear to live.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Dance until you shatter yourself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Run from what's comfortable. Forget safety. Live where you fear to live.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Life is a balance between holding on and letting go.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Words are a pretext. It is the inner bond that draws one person to another, not words.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: I want to sing like the birds sing, not worrying about who hears or what they think.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Silence is the language of God, all else is poor translation.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Let silence take you to the core of life.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Listen with ears of tolerance! See through the eyes of compassion! Speak with the language of love.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Reason is powerless in the expression of love.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Be empty of worrying. Think of who created thought.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The only lasting beauty is the beauty of the heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Whatever you love, you are.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Only from the heart can you touch the sky.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The art of knowing is knowing what to ignore.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Be full of sorrow, that you may become hill of joy. Weep, that you may break into laughter.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Close your eyes. Fall in love. Stay there.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The soul has been given its own ears to hear things mind does not understand.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: When someone is counting out gold for you, don't look at your hands, or the gold. Look at the giver.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.text: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The only way out is through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: What doesn't kill you makes you stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: It is not the critic who counts; not the man who points out how the strong man stumbles.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Wherever you go, there you are.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Those who have a 'why' to live, can bear with almost any 'how'.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.text: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.text: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
